name: Rene
greetingDialogue: Hi! Do you have time to give me a haircut?
positiveReaction: Many thanks! I'm glad I can sport this haircut for the better of society.
negativeReaction: This is awful! Don't you have any respect?!

dialogues.text: I really like this months haircut. It's got something gallant and noble to it, which is perfect for my grandmothers commemoration.
Very. She was from the 2030's and died eleven years ago. She was there for the formation of the Party, the Climate Restoration...

responses.text: What was her opinion on the Neutralisation?
What a time to have experienced.

dialogues.text: She had values she stood behind, values that ultimately decided the fate of humanity. I respect her a lot.

responses.text: Do you share your grandmother's view?

dialogues.text: She supported it fully, just like I do. She'd experienced plenty of nasty things in her time. I'm very glad those don't happen anymore.
Definitly. What the Party has done for us now all started with people like her. They were the ones that decided to be done with suffering.
Yes. A sustainable climate, a world without discrimination. When we act together we can do great things.
She told me all about it when I was young. She was a strong advocate of the Party. We owe it to her that we can live like we do now.
